name: Rustea Conversation
description:
A short, cute game to warm up your day. You can try to get all the possible dialogue if you're a completionist, or just read one or two branches if you'd prefer. Either way, it's just meant to be a fast, light-read.

Credits:

  • Story & programming: Foleso
  • Character art & design: Haiyoooo
  • Background art: upklyak / Freepik
  • Music: Rest! (Ricardo Cuello)

Features:

  • 3 different endings.
  • 35 choices.
  • A cute warrior ♥

Note: Do not use the font options in the settings. It will break the game.
